I apologize for the misunderstanding earlier. Based on your request, I will remove any irrelevant entities and only identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraphs:

Paragraph 1:

The World Health Organization (WHO) is a specialized agency of the United Nations responsible for international public health. The WHO Constitution, which establishes the agency's governing structure and principles, was signed on 22 July 1946 at the International Health Conference in New York and came into force on 7 April 1948.

Paragraph 2:

The International Monetary Fund (IMF) is an international organization headquartered in Washington, D.C., consisting of 190 countries working to foster global monetary cooperation, secure financial stability, facilitate international trade, promote high employment and sustainable economic growth, and reduce poverty around the world.

Paragraph 3:

Microsoft Corporation is an American multinational technology company that develops, manufactures, licenses, supports, and sells computer software, consumer electronics, personal computers, and related services. Microsoft was founded by Bill Gates and Paul Allen on April 4, 1975, and its current CEO is Satya Nadella.

Organizations identified:

1. World Health Organization (WHO)
2. International Monetary Fund (IMF)
3. Microsoft Corporation
